customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Things have been very busy at the Association, so I haven't had much time to play the game recently. Fair warning, I'm pretty strong, though."
Kurisu opens his Casket of Tomes, revealing a deck organized around "Kamisato Ayaka," "Yoimiya," and "Xingqiu."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Pyro.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Kamisato Ayaka
customize.desc:
"Frostflake Heron" Kamisato Ayaka

As graceful as the frost drifting in the wind, as elegant as a heron perched in a courtyard.

customize.name: Yoimiya
customize.desc:
Yoimiya: Euforia di fuochi

Capitana e Schermagliatrice della squadra Naganohara per l'11º torneo amichevole su invito di Hanamizaka!

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
"Juvenile Galant" Xingqiu

"Is it just me, or are the protagonists in novels nowadays all students of some private school or another..."

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The president of the International Trade Association has already sorted out his deck and Character Cards. Now, he sits quietly at the table, waiting for players to take on the Adventure Challenge that he has set up.

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc:
Ganyu, Sguardo del plenilunio

"Questo comunicato stampa è programmato per domani...

Immagino che potrei lavorarci stanotte e terminarlo."

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc:
Keqing, Dominatrice del tuono

Può realizzare dei mazzi mai concepiti e vincere delle battaglie impossibili.
